page.title: 19CUSTOMS
page.content: Schools in the Kingswinford area usually hold an annual fund raising event such as a{fair or fete.}At Dawley Brook Primary School there is the{May Fair}which is planned by the Parent Teacher Association which organise the stalls, sideshows and main events of the afternoon. A{May Queen,}her attendants and a page boy are chosen from children of the school. Events start with the May Queen and her attendants riding in a horsedrawn carriage from Kingswinford to the school in procession with the local band, Scouts, Guides and children in fancy dress. On arrival the May Queen is crowned and the May Fair formally opened by a celebrity. During the afternoon, special events and displays take place. The day ends with the grand raffle draw.
